mapper.insert: insert into imgs (imageName, originalLocalUrl, originalAliyunUrl, detectLocalUrl, detectAliyunUrl, detectTime, defectTagId, defectCount, confidenceLevel, createTime, updateTime, createUser, updateUser, mark, isOpe, isShow) values (#{imageName}, #{originalLocalUrl}, #{originalAliyunUrl}, #{detectLocalUrl}, #{detectAliyunUrl}, #{detectTime}, #{defectTagId}, #{defectCount}, #{confidenceLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{mark}, #{isOpe}, #{isShow});
